div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die
Julij Anno quo supra

The said day It was deliuerit be ane assis' William
blinsel forspekar that thomas menyeis sal deliuer to george
brone iij barrelis and demi f' of Salt And the said george sale
deliuer to him ane barrel of Salmond' sufficient merchand gude
within xv dais eftir lammes next follouing

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die Julij
anno quo supra

The samyn day comperit Alexander peirpont Inglisman with William
blinsel his forspekar and producit ane obligacion befor the ballieis
of xviij barrelis Salmond' aucht to him be Jonhne of Culane Jhon'
Colisone and James leslie quhilkis being rede the saide Alexander
askit pament of fywe barrellis and thridpart barrell fra the saidez'
Jonhne and Jonhne restand' vnpait of the samyn obligacion of the
forsaide James part becaus' thai war' bundin tile him
coniunctlie and Seueralie Renunciand' al benefice of diuision'
quhilkis obligacione the saidez Jonhne and Jonhne grantit And'
In continent the ballieis be virtew of thar' office distrenyeit the
gudis of the saidez Jonhne and Jonhne for pament of the said' fiwe
barrelis and thridpart barrell of Salmond' and to maid the said' Alexander
pament of the samyne

Curia balliuorum burgi p de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem xxix die Julij anno quo supra

The said' Alexander red aldirman forspekar for marion' nachty allegit
that Alexander nachty suld' be nay preyve anent the age of Richerd nachty
becaus' he vnsuorne said' the said' riche was nocht xvij yeris
ald' quhile the rud' day in haruist to cum protestand his deposi
cion' gif it happinis to be tane turne the said' marion' to nay
preiudice

Eodem die actio debatabilis inter henricum forbes procuratorio nomine Richardi
nachty ex vna et mariotam nachty partibus ab altera cum consensu parcium
continuatur cum consensu parcium sub spe concordie vsque in octauum diem post premu
nicionem per dictum henricum fiendum absque preiudicio alicuius partis

Eodem die Willelmus Wormet deuenit plegius legalis quod
Andreas branche erit Indempnis pro Dauid mar' et parte sua aliter
quam per viam iuris Et Andreas lousone deuenit plegius legalis quod
dictus Dauid mar erit Indempnis pro Andrea branche et parte sua
aliter quam per viam iuris Et quilibet dictarum parcium obligatur per ostensionem manus
ad releuandum fideiussores et plegios suos de huiusmodi fideiussione

the saide day Androu Culane yongar Alexander gray William
futhes Robert Crage and Jonhne Waus was chosin and suorne
the gret aithe to extent and taxt the Some of xl li' apone
the haile tone to furnis' xxtj bovis to pas' with louten
nent to the asseginge of the Strinthtis of the Ilis et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
secundo die augusti anno quo supra

add.foreign: penes exitum cum locumtenente ad Insulas

div.p:
The saide day Williame gibsone belman at commavnd of
the aldirman passit throw the haile tone and warnit and chargit
In our' Souerane lordis nayme and in the aldirmannis and
balyeis behalf to cum to the tolbutht in continent and pay thar
taxt and contribucion to furnys' the personis furtht to the meting
of my lord' of huntlie loutennent to pas' with him to the
assegeing of the Strinthtis of the Ilis eftir the tenor'
of his precept' direkit tharapon

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto die
Julij Anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid barbour' fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Willelmum
barbour' suum legittimum procuratorem ad petendum et recipiendum vnam
barrellam salmonum sibi per Johannem brogan debitam et Inde quieteclamand'
prosequend' agend' et defendend' promitten' de Rato et grato

The samyn day Alexander coupar was conuikit be ane suorne
assis' Robert blinsel forspekar for the making' of barrelis
gretar thane the binde and mesour' gevin and vsit be the tone
to his singular profit and the dampnage of the haile tovne

The saide day Dauid Duffous' become Souerte be his hande
and his gudis to the aldirman for Jonhne of Corskeis taxt and
the vnlawis for forstallinge of woll and skinnis

the saide day Robert glenmaluyn sone and ayr to vmquhile
murthow glenmaluyn grantit that his said fadir hede resauit
fra Jonhne Sthevinsone tua markis of annuell of the yer'
befor his saide fadir deces' pertening to Jonhne malisone Ande the
saide Jonhne dischargit Jonhne low of borrowgange of xxij s'
that he come borghe for Jho to him for Androw philpsone of
the saide Some

Eodem die Dauid Steuarte fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem
Waus suum legittimum procuratorem actorem et factorem ad petendum

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem ix die augusti anno
quo supra

The samyn day Jonhne menyeis novmerit In gold' and Siluer four scoir'
markis four markis aucht s' and viij d' apone the commone kyst
redy to be send' and deliuerit to the factouris of the bischoipe of orknay
that is to say to gelis farchar' and allegit that the aldirman suld' caus'
him be pait of ix markis and x s' that he deliuerit at his commavnd

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
duodecimo die mensis augusti anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne Duncansone of banf was conuikit
for the forstallin of the burghe' of skinnis be ane suorne
assis' becaus' he falyeit in his aithe and wald' nocht quyt
him as it was ordanit be ane Suorne assis' Dauid'
menyeis forspekar'

the saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne Sthe
vinsone forspekar that William lammyngtone sal caus' thome quhit
be pait of xij s' within terme of law or ellis entir William quhit
yongar of Abirdene within this burghe befor ane officiar'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem xiiij die augusti Anno quo supra

div.head:
Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem breuis ydiotrie
Alexandri glastre
div.p:
Johannes Sthevinsone Jacobus Crak Dauid mar' Richardus
hile senior murdaicus blak Andreas murray Junior Jacobus andirson'
Cristinus prat Johannes andirsone Andreas lousone Willelmus andirsone
senior Richardus litstar et richardus hile Junior Jurati dicunt quod
Alexander glastir est Incompos mentis fatuus et naturaliter ydiota
secundum eorum noticiam et estimacionem sicut eundum diuersis annis elapsis
viderunt et cognouerunt sic quod timetur de alienacione tam terrarum
suarum quam aliarum rerum mobilium et immobilium Et quod Johannes moir' nepos
suis est proximior Consanguineus patris suj Et quod ille Johannes
proximior est sue rei prouidus et potens cauere ydonie
de administracione rei aliene Et quod est etatis xx annorum
vel eocirca datum et clausum sub Sigillo dicti Alexandri de camera vnius
balliuorum et Sigillis quorundam quj hinc Inquisicioni Intererant faciende anno
die et lecto superscriptis

The saide day the ballieis assignit the last day of this Instant
monetht to thomas Waus to ansuer to the borghe' strekit one
him be gilbert Waus of many for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of demi merk of maile

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xvjo die augusti anno quo supra

the samyn day Alexander rede aldirman offerit him redy to pas'
with Williame colp and cristiane turinge his spous' to the wattir of Done
and entir and putt thame In ane half nethis fischingis of the saide
wattir and to fulfile al pontis contenit In our Soueran lordis lettres
and decret gevin tharapon and Requirit the said' Williame to pas' with
w him that he mycht do that accordit him of resone
and askit Instrument tharapon witnes Dauid menyeis Alexander chamer yongar
Johne Kintor Robert huchonsone

The samyn day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Androu Culane eldar forspekar that Williame lyntone sale
pay the iiijor markis to Robert Arduthoquhe for the
malt that his woman resauit and disponit within his hous'

The saide day alexander prat come borgh' and dettour for the saide
Williame to pay the said Some to Robert eldar of luthoquhe
withtin terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo
die Augusti Anno quo supra

The saide day comperit ane Richt nobile and honorabile mane Alexander
Iruyne of Drum In presence of the court for carnale affection
and resonabile caus' concerning him gaff grantit and assignit be
ane gluff to Dauid Iruyne his Sone gottin betuix him
and vmquhile Nannys menyeis quhom god assolye ale and hale
his gudis beand' within the landis of Coule that is to say xxtj
oxin and fiwe chaldir of malt fermez yerlie to giddir with assigna
cion of the tak for ale the dais of the said' Dauidis lyve and
thre hundretht wederis being within the foreste in buchane
to Sustene him at the Scolis as in the Instrumentis takin
tharapon mair' fullely is contenit befor thir witnes Alexander burnat
of leis Alexander burnat his sone and apperinge ayr thomas prat
Androw murray eldar thomas mar William blinsele Jonhne skene
Richerd ruthirfurde mathow branche thomas menyeis laurence
of Cravmonde gilbert ros' Jonhne robertsone In taruas philp
Dunbrek and sere Jonhne Stirueling notar public'

The samyn day Alexander Iruyne of Drvm assignit gaf and
gravntit for resonabile caus' concerning him tile Alexander Iruyne
his Sone gottin betuix him and vmquhile Nannys menyeis
ale and haile his gudis beand' in Kinharrowquhe that is to say the
Corne xxiiij oxin and thre hundretht yowis to giddir with the
assignacion of the said' tak for the termes of the said' Alexander
andiris of Drvm be ane gluff to Sustene him at the
Scolis as In the Instrumentis takin tharapon mair' fullie is
contenit befor the said' witnes and notar

The said' day Alexander Iruyn of Drvm for carnale affection
and resonabile caus' concerning him gaff grantit and assignit
be ane gluff to Jonhne Iruyn his Sone gottin betuix
him and vmquhile Nannys menyeis ale and hall his
gudis corne oxin and viijxx youis within the Cragtone
to giddir with the assignacion of the said' tak for his
termes as In the Instrumentis takin tharapon mair' fullely is
contenit befor the said' witnes and notar

The saide day Alexander Iruyn of Drum for diuers' resonabile
Caus' concerning him gaf gravntit and assignit tile Agnes
Iruyn his douchtir gottin betuix him and vmquhile Nannis
menyeis ale and haile his gudis corne oxin and viijxx youis beinge
In Dulmayek to giddir with xxiiij ky and ane bull in collangy
to vpbringe hir' and mary hir' befor the saide witnes and notar
